data.wordByWord: وَٱلَّيْلِ [By the night] إِذَا [when] يَغْشَىٰ [it covers]
وَٱلنَّهَارِ [And the day] إِذَا [when] تَجَلَّىٰ [it shines in brightness]
وَمَا [And He Who] خَلَقَ [created] ٱلذَّكَرَ [the male] وَٱلْأُنثَىٰٓ [and the female]
إِنَّ [Indeed] سَعْيَكُمْ [your efforts] لَشَتَّىٰ [(are) surely diverse]
فَأَمَّا [Then as for] مَنْ [(him) who] أَعْطَىٰ [gives] وَٱتَّقَىٰ [and fears]
وَصَدَّقَ [And believes] بِٱلْحُسْنَىٰ [in the best]
فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ [Then We will ease him] لِلْيُسْرَىٰ [towards [the] ease]
وَأَمَّا [But as for] مَنۢ [(him) who] بَخِلَ [withholds] وَٱسْتَغْنَىٰ [and considers himself free from need]

words.translation: and considers himself free from need

data.wordByWord: وَكَذَّبَ [And denies] بِٱلْحُسْنَىٰ [the best]
فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ [Then We will ease him] لِلْعُسْرَىٰ [towards [the] difficulty]

data.textUthmani: وَمَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ
data.wordByWord: وَمَا [And not] يُغْنِى [will avail] عَنْهُ [him] مَالُهُۥٓ [his wealth] إِذَا [when] تَرَدَّىٰٓ [he falls]
إِنَّ [Indeed] عَلَيْنَا [upon Us] لَلْهُدَىٰ [(is) the guidance]
وَإِنَّ [And indeed] لَنَا [for Us] لَلْـَٔاخِرَةَ [(is) the Hereafter] وَٱلْأُولَىٰ [and the first (life)]
فَأَنذَرْتُكُمْ [So I warn you] نَارًۭا [(of) a Fire] تَلَظَّىٰ [blazing]
لَا [Not] يَصْلَىٰهَآ [will burn (in) it] إِلَّا [except] ٱلْأَشْقَى [the most wretched]
ٱلَّذِى [The one who] كَذَّبَ [denied] وَتَوَلَّىٰ [and turned away]
وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا [But will be removed from it] ٱلْأَتْقَى [the righteous]

words.translation: But will be removed from it

data.wordByWord: ٱلَّذِى [The one who] يُؤْتِى [gives] مَالَهُۥ [his wealth] يَتَزَكَّىٰ [(to) purify himself]

data.textUthmani: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعْمَةٍ تُجْزَىٰٓ
data.wordByWord: وَمَا [And not] لِأَحَدٍ [for anyone] عِندَهُۥ [with him] مِن [any] نِّعْمَةٍۢ [favor] تُجْزَىٰٓ [to be recompensed]
إِلَّا [Except] ٱبْتِغَآءَ [seeking] وَجْهِ [(the) Countenance] رَبِّهِ [(of) his Lord] ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ [the Most High]
وَلَسَوْفَ [And soon, surely] يَرْضَىٰ [he will be pleased]
